alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Montgomery; Pike (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 10:05PM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS...PIKE... SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND BROWN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS... NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN...NORTHERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI AND PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 1004 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Sterling to near Montgomery City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mount Sterling and Davis. This also includes Graham Cave State Park and Siloam Springs State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 72 between exits 20 and 35. Interstate 70 in Missouri near exit 170. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
